title: Zoo
brief_description: Visual essay comparing people and animals at a zoo. Using a ‘candid camera’ technique, Haanstra concentrates on commonly shared facial expressions and physical gestures such as eating and sleeping. Accompanied by a jazz music soundtrack but no spoken commentary.
